About Me

I am a first year computer engieering student in Univeristy of Waterloo, I am enthusiastic in programming.

Want to solve real life questions by coding.

Also, hope to make new friends.

"Benjamin was very hard-working, dedicated and reliable in all tasks he was assigned. You could be assured that Benjamin would ensure he did his best in the role and was very enthusiastic to help others. It was a pleasure to have Benjamin serve as a Peer Leader this past summer!"
